item.title: Basic Q & A
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Central Heating question and answer§ Level Basic Q-1 Bedroom RST should be set to what temperature ?§ 20 Degree Centigrade Bathroom temperature should be set at 23 Degree Centigrade. Q-2 What amp fuse cartridge is used in fused spar linked to a boiler ?§ The fused spar has 3 amp cartridge All boilers requires 1 amp. While MCB ( mini circuit board ) is of 6 amp Q-3 What device reduces possible noise and boiler lock out ?
